title: Fragments, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk; metal thread; linen
Technique: embroidered
description: Yellow horizontally ribbed ground.  Large-scale polychrome silk embroidered design of flowers, fruit, ornamental rococo scrolls, and architectural motifs.  Trimmed with silver galloon.  Backed with red linen. Front composed of a number of small pieces. Made of material from France/ 18th century.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 19th century.Medium: silk; metal thread; linen
Technique: embroidered. 1905-20-1-a/h.
